title: Authors and Citation
text: Ahmed Homoudi. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Homoudi (2022). KlimaKonformC3: Analysis Agricultural Simulations, KlimaKonform (C3). R package version 2.0.0.
code: @Manual{,   title = {KlimaKonformC3: Analysis of Agricultural Simulations, KlimaKonform (C3)},   author = {Ahmed Homoudi},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 2.0.0}, }

title: Analysis of Agricultural Simulations, KlimaKonform (C3)
text: goal KlimaKonformC3 analyse Agricultural Simulations performed within Project KlimaKonform (TB C3 Landwirtschaft). project homepage .

title: Analysis of Agricultural Simulations, KlimaKonform (C3)
text: KlimaKonformC3 available CRAN, can use install.packages("KlimaKonformC3"). can install development version KlimaKonformC3 like :

title: Analysis of Agricultural Simulations, KlimaKonform (C3)
text: Many types functions included package: 1. sim functions: mainly written perform analysis individual simulation files/file. 2. ens functions: mainly written perform analysis ensemble files/file. 3. clima functions: mainly written perform analysis climate projections used agricultural simulations.

title: Analysis of Agricultural Simulations, KlimaKonform (C3)
text: R scripts used production included production folder.

title: Analysis of Agricultural Simulations, KlimaKonform (C3)
text: Please file bug reports feature requests https://github.com/ahmathlete/KlimaKonformC3/issues

title: Analysis of Agricultural Simulations, KlimaKonform (C3)
text: Original project logo official project website mentioned . logo modified @ColinFay’s awesome hexmake tool.

title: Bodenuebersichts — Bodenuebersichts
text: Soil maps types KlimaKonfrom Model domain dataframe similar resolution Monica model.

title: Bodenuebersichts — Bodenuebersichts
text: data frame three columns 19183 rows x coordinates x dimensions 1000 m resolution y coordinates y dimensions 1000 m resolution TKLE_NR values describing soil map types SpatRaster

title: Bodenuebersichts — Bodenuebersichts
text: Bodenuebersichtskarte 1:200.000 (BueK200) https://www.bgr.bund.de/DE/Themen/Boden/Projekte/Informationsgrundlagen-laufend/BUEK200/BUEK200.html

title: Bundeslaender — Bundeslaender
text: Data shapefile Federal States Germany used plotting Included Federal states : Bayern, Sachsen, Sachsen-Anhalt Thüringen

title: Bundeslaender — Bundeslaender
text: tibble 4 rows 2 variables: Name Name fedral state geometry geometry federal state

title: Bundeslaender — Bundeslaender
text: Bundesamt für Kartographie und Geodäsie - 2021 https://gdz.bkg.bund.de/index.php/default/digitale-geodaten/verwaltungsgebiete/verwaltungsgebiete-1-250-000-ebenen-stand-01-01-vg250-ebenen-01-01.html

title: DEM or DGM — DEM_data
text: Das Digitale Geländemodell Gitterweite 200 m (DGM200) beschreibt die Geländeformen der Erdoberfläche durch eine einem regelmäßigen Gitter angeordnete, Lage und Höhe georeferenzierte Punktmenge. Die Gitterweite beträgt 200 m. Der Datenbestand deckt das Territorium der Bundesrepublik Deutschland ab. Die Nutzung der Geodaten und Geodatendienste wird durch die "Verordnung zur Festlegung der Nutzungsbestimmungen für die Bereitstellung von Geodaten des Bundes (GeoNutzV)" http://www.geodatenzentrum.de/auftrag/pdf/geonutz.pdf geregelt.

title: DEM or DGM — DEM_data
text: data frame three columns 19172 rows x coordinates x dimensions 1000 m resolution y coordinates y dimensions 1000 m resolution DEM values describing elevation value (DEM)

title: DEM or DGM — DEM_data
text: Bundesamt für Kartographie und Geodäsie (BKG) http://www.bkg.bund.de

title: Political districts shape file — Landkreise
text: Data shapefile political districts used plotting Included political districts: Altenburger Land, Burgenlandkreis, Greiz, Vogtlandkreis.

title: Political districts shape file — Landkreise
text: tibble 3 rows 2 variables: Name Name political district geometry geometry political district

title: Political districts shape file — Landkreise

title: Climate Diagram (Absolute) — clima_diagramm_abs
text: Plot absolute climate diagram grid points climate data used run Monica models. function receives data frame, preferable prepared R code '/production/Prod_klima_diagramm_4corners.R'. input data representing grids KlimaKonform model region least Regions. meta data required plot either production script function .

title: Climate Diagram (Absolute) — clima_diagramm_abs
text: data data frame containing daily data plotted. data contain min, max, mean temperature precipitation. three locations, e.g., MO Greiz. run_id character variable either pointing run id, please refer simulation setup file. output_path string pointing output directory output plot

title: Climate Diagram (Relative) — clima_diagramm_change

title: Climate Diagram (Relative) — clima_diagramm_change
text: data data frame containing daily data plotted. data contain min, max, mean temperature precipitation. three locations, e.g., MO, MM, MU. run_id character variable either pointing run id, please refer simulation setup file. output_path string pointing output directory output plot

what: Plotting 12 maps from 3 RCP scenario from ensemble files — ens_12maps
title: Plotting 12 maps from 3 RCP scenario from ensemble files — ens_12maps
text: function receives three netCDF files, variable name, statistical ensemble member plot 12 maps, considering 3 RCPs X four periods  desired put directory output placed.

title: Plotting 12 maps from 3 RCP scenario from ensemble files — ens_12maps
code: ens_12maps(   netCDF.files,   variable,   region,   landcover,   stat_var,   language,   run_id,   output_path,   output_csv )

title: Plotting 12 maps from 3 RCP scenario from ensemble files — ens_12maps
text: netCDF.files netCDF files contain similar simulation variables. provided including full path files variable inside netCDF files, e.g., AET region string referring region plot; "total", "Vogtlandkreis", "Burgenlandkreis", "Greiz", "Altenburger Land". landcover numeric variable indicating land cover considered. consider land cover give 1000. stat_var string referring statistical variable plot case file ensemble file, example, "mean","sd","median","max" "min" language character variable either "EN" "DE", specify languages plots run_id character variable either "2ter", "3ter", "4ter" specifying run used produce ensemble. output_path string pointing output directory, end "/" output_csv string pointing output directory csv file produced pre-processing netCDF files

title: Plotting 12 maps from 3 RCP scenario from ensemble files — ens_12maps

title: Plotting Density of three RCPs scenarios  for four different periods — ens_density_3RCPs_4Periods
code: ens_density_3RCPs_4Periods(   netCDF.files,   variable,   region,   landcover,   stat_var,   language,   run_id,   output_path,   output_csv )

title: Plotting Density of three RCPs scenarios  for four different periods — ens_density_3RCPs_4Periods
text: netCDF.files netCDF files contain similar simulation variables. provided including full path files variable inside netCDF files, e.g., AET region string referring region plot; "total", "Vogtlandkreis", "Burgenlandkreis", "Greiz", "Altenburger Land". landcover numeric variable indicating land cover considered. consider land cover give 1000. stat_var string referring statistical variable plot case file ensemble file, example, "mean","sd","median","max" "min" language character variable either "EN" "DE", specify languages plots run_id character variable either "2ter", "3ter", "4ter" specifying run used produce ensemble. output_path string pointing output directory, end "/" output_csv string pointing output directory csv file produced pre-processing netCDF files

what: Plotting boxplots from one simulation from KlimaKonform TB C3 for four periods. — sim_boxplots
title: Plotting boxplots from one simulation from KlimaKonform TB C3 for four periods. — sim_boxplots
text: function receives one netCDF files, custom y axis limits, produce box plots. desired put directory output placed.

title: Plotting boxplots from one simulation from KlimaKonform TB C3 for four periods. — sim_boxplots
code: sim_boxplots(   netCDF.file,   region,   landcover,   y.axis.limits,   language,   run_id,   output_path,   output_csv )

title: Plotting boxplots from one simulation from KlimaKonform TB C3 for four periods. — sim_boxplots
text: netCDF.file netCDF file provided including full path file region string referring region plot; "total","Vogtlandkreis", "Burgenlandkreis", "Greiz", "Altenburger Land". landcover numeric variable indicating land cover considered. consider land cover give 1000. y.axis.limits vector length 2L produce plots similar y axis limits. provided, variable supplied limits package. language character variable either "EN" "DE", specify languages plots run_id character variable either "2ter", "3ter", "4ter" specificng run used produce ensemble. output_path string pointing output directory, end "/" output_csv string pointing output directory csv file produced pre-processing netCDF file
